content: Chamfer Guide 1 ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for grinders and sanders- ### FEATURES:Features Virtually dustless grinding Precise control of chamfer size – you can use an exchangeable clip-in guide for exact chamfering Robust – carbon-fiber-reinforced construction to withstand tough jobsite conditions Avoid chipped edges – use with a continuous rim cup wheel to reduce the risk of chipping the concrete Applications Grinding chamfers into concrete edges ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Depth gauges Technical Data | Accessory type | Depth gauges ### ITEMS- 2273027 - Chamfer Guide 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x 1 INCH Adapter
